    • Constructor Detail

      • Match

        public Match(Player player,
             java.lang.String game_name)
        Create a new match and adds the creator to the list of players. After the creation the match is not yet ready to start with only one player
        Parameters:
        player - The player creator of the game
        game_name - The name which will be displayed in the match list

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Main method which controls the whole game, from the choice of the SchemeCards to the calculation of the final score by setting up each round and spawning a new round thread
